result.arabic_text: فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ غُثَآءٗۚ فَبُعۡدٗا لِّلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
result.translation: 41. Edde luk Jibriil gibdi xongoloo kee caacayay cakkil keenil rubnet ken finqisne, tokkel weeqi baahe buura ken abne, tokkel daalimiinih yan maray koroosite Yalli ken finqisay isi Racmatak mayxaarah ken yayxaaray!
